name: Rip & Sell
description:
Submission to Ludum Dare 44. The theme was " Your life is currency". Playable in browser.

The DoomSeller has come to the 4th circle of hell to slay money demons.

Arrow keys to move, space bar to punch.

You are equipped with a new cryptoHP called Dolaroo, watch out for the exchange rate. You lose 10HP when you get hit, depending on the current value of  Dolaroo, it could cost you 1  or your entire life.

If you kill demons too fast, the value of Dolaroo will crash and you will become vulnerable. If you leave the demons alive, they will slowly buy stocks, and the value of Dolaroo will increase. But watch out, as they buy, the demons will grow more powerful. 

You need to keep an eye on the exchange rate and be careful not to get overwhelmed.

I might come back to it and fix  balance and bugs later.
